p: The robust Zn 2+ conducting gel electrolyte was formulated from water-in-trisalt (WiTS) electrolyte by mixing ZnSO 4, Zn(TFO) 2, and LiTFSI (in a 1:1:2 mass ratio, respectively) in 20% water using 10% poly(tetrafluoroethylene) (PTFE) polymer binder. The resulting white gel is a highly flexible, yet semisolid, electrolyte that can be molded to any shape (inset of Figure 1 A for optical image).
